items.title: Golden Hour Magic
items.content_text:
Captured this stunning sunset from the rooftop yesterday. The way the light painted the clouds was absolutely magical.

Camera settings:
- ISO 100
- f/8
- 1/125s
- 85mm lens

Sometimes the best shots happen when you least expect them.

items.summary: A beautiful sunset photograph with technical details

attachments.title: Golden Hour Sunset
attachments.alt_text: A dramatic sunset with golden clouds over a city skyline

items.title: City Life Time-lapse
items.content_text:
Spent 6 hours capturing the rhythm of city life from dawn to dusk. Compressed into 2 minutes of pure urban poetry.

This project taught me so much about patience and planning. Every frame tells a story of people going about their daily lives.

Shot with a DSLR on a sturdy tripod, taking a photo every 10 seconds for 6 hours straight.

items.title: Creative Process Podcast - Episode 12
items.content_text:
In this episode, I sit down with photographer Maria Santos to discuss her journey from amateur to professional photographer.

We cover:
- Finding your unique style
- Building a portfolio
- Working with clients
- The business side of creative work
- Dealing with creative blocks

Maria shares some incredible insights about the importance of persistence and continuous learning in creative fields.
